summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3842 for the improvement of West Findlay Street, from 46th Avenue Southwest to 49th Avenue Southwest; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by grading and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 47164, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
